The "glrad" program seems to work on my system, though it's not terribly
fast.  This is a new program that comes with 3.4 and uses the same mouse
interface as the holodeck program rholo but just draws the scene
cosine-shaded using OpenGL primitives.  Doesn't work too well for large
models, but if the model's reasonably small, OpenGL handles it OK.

-Greg
